entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is swimming through the water.

entities.name: grindylows
entities.description: Creatures that chase Harry when he gets too close to them. (Mentioned in the text as 'they always chase me...')

entities.name: merpeople
entities.description: Creatures with mermaid-like features, carrying spears and chasing a giant squid. (Mentioned in the text as 'paintings of merpeople on it')

entities.name: giant squid
entities.description: A large sea creature being chased by merpeople, according to the paintings on the rock.

relationships.description: Harry mentions that grindylows always chase him when he gets too close to them. (Mentioned in the text as 'they always chase me...')
Harry swims past a rock with paintings of merpeople and follows their mersong. (Mentioned in the text as 'he swam on past the rock, following the mersong')
According to the paintings on the rock, merpeople are chasing a giant squid. (Mentioned in the text as 'they were carrying spears and chasing what looked like the gi ant squid')
